S e b u a h space b a t u space b a t a space m a s s a n y a space 2 comma 5 space k g space d i space b e r a d a space p a d a space l a n t a i space y a n g space d a t a r. space J i k a space l u a s space b i d a n g space s e n t u h space b a t u space b a t a space d e n g a n space l a n t a i space 0 comma 2 space x space 10 to the power of negative 2 end exponent space m squared space d a n space p e r c e p a tan space g r a v i a t a s i space b u m i space 10 space m divided by s squared space comma space m a k a space t e k a n a n space b a t u space b a t a space p a d a space l a n t a i space a d a l a h space.... space N divided by m squared.
